text:
Selena Gomez takes her maid of honor duties very seriously! With her cousin, Priscilla DeLeon, set to walk down the aisle later this summer, Gomez threw her the ultimate bachelorette party in Punta Mita, Mexico over the weekend.

According to the bride-to-be, Gomez threw a bachelorette party for the record books. She posted a photo to Instagram of herself giggling with Gomez on the beach with the caption, "I wouldn’t want anyone else standing next to me at the alter (even the two pregnant ones that couldn’t attend) My maid of honor really showed out this weekend and threw me the bachelorette party of my dreams. I am forever grateful."

The weekend was full of festivities, which included an ATV excursion, presumably organized by Gomez.

The bridal party also took some time to wander through the Punta Mita streets, with the bride sharing snaps of her squad on Instagram.

Of course, a Punta Mita bachelorette party just isn't complete without time spent on the beach. Another bridesmaid, Theresa Marie Mingus, shared a snap of herself, Gomez, and the bride posing in a beach cabana. "My fam is getting married," read the caption. The trio wore colorful bathing suits from Mingus's line Krahs, with the bride in a white one-piece, Mingus in a neon green bikini, and Gomez in a red one-piece.

Gomez even took some time to slip into the waves to model Mingus's bathing suit design, which the brand later posted on Instagram.

Gomez is no stranger to bachelorette parties and bridesmaid duties. The singer threw a beautiful bridal shower for her friend in January and she celebrated her best friend's upcoming nuptials with a bachelorette party in Cabo in February.
title: Selena Gomez Just Threw an Epic Bachelorette Party in Mexico

meta_data.description: Selena Gomez takes her maid of honor duties seriously! She just threw her cousin the ultimate bachelorette party in Mexico!
